title: Teams/Matchups included will controlled by CMS config
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_steps: WHEN user views Teams and Matchups in module
custom_expected: THEN Teams included should match the Team IDs included in CMS config

title: Show PS Push logo
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_steps: WHEN user views the PS Push module
custom_expected: THEN the PS Push logo should appear above the module

title: Show PS Push sponsored logo
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_steps: WHEN user views the PS Push module
custom_expected: THEN Sponsored logo (image) should appear beneath the PS Push logo and above the PS Push Scoreboard module

title: CHECK for no selected teams playing on a day
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_steps: WHEN CMS config contains Team IDs that DO NOT have scheduled games for that day
custom_expected: THEN PS Push module should not appear but the Regular Season miniSB should still appear.

title: Loading Placeholder should just show miniSB
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_expected: THEN the Placeholder image should resemble the miniSB and will not resemble a PS Push module

title: PS Push UI matchups/info should appear same as miniSB
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_steps: WHEN user views the PS Push module
custom_expected: THEN the UI/UX for Game Matchups and info would be the same as the miniSB

title: Teams and Matchups should be removed from original module if they are in PS Push
custom_preconds: GIVEN user visits MLB.com in viewports XL & L AND PS config is turned on
custom_steps: WHEN PS Push config is turned on and "X" amount of games are set
custom_expected: THEN user should see games included in PS Push module NOT appear in regular miniSB module

title: miniSB should sit below the PS Push module
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_steps: WHEN user views the miniSB and PS Push
custom_expected: THEN the miniSB should sit below the PS Push

title: CHECK if Push module is turned off for a day
custom_preconds: GIVEN Postseason Push module has been added to MLB homepage
custom_steps: WHEN Product turns off the PS Push
custom_expected: THEN miniSB should appear with all games being played
